DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate cost-effectiveness remote ischemic conditioning adjunct primary percutaneous coronary intervention perspective Danish healthcare system .
DOC.brief_title: Cost-effectiveness Remote Ischemic Conditioning Adjunct Primary Percutaneous Coronary Intervention
DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) age ≥ 18 year , ( 2 ) symptom duration ≤ 12 hour prior admission , ( 3 ) STsegment elevation ≥ 0.1 mV two contiguous electrocardiogram ( ECG ) lead ( 1 ) diagnosis confirm hospital admission , ( 2 ) history previous myocardial infarction , ( 3 ) previous CABG , ( 4 ) chest pain > 12 hour prior admission
